'''Ancient Stone Key''' is a Quest Item obtained from the [[Tanit Camps]].

The item can only be obtained once the ''[[Her Foes Rage Like Great Waters...]]'' [[World Quest]] Series has been completed. It will be on the ground where [[Babel]] used to stand.

It is used to open the vault on the lowest level of the Tanit Camps, within which can be found 4 [[Chest|Precious Chest]]s, each containing 50,000 [[Mora]].
